elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} If you have ten or more Mana Orbs: Up to two target Characters in play or in Reserve each gain 1 boost.  {R} You may discard a Character from your Reserve. If you do: Create an [Ordis Recruit 1/1/1] Soldier token in each of your Expeditions.
